Main Notes
Sl.No.
Notes
Notification

Notification
Date

This Section does not cover : (a) animal brush making bristles or hair (heading 0502), horsehair
or horsehair waste (heading 0511), (b) human hair or articles of human hair (heading 0501, 6703
or 6704), except straining cloth of a kind commonly used in oil presses or the like (heading 5911),
(c) cotton linters or other vegetable materials of

Main Notes

Sl.No.
Notes
Notification
Date
Notification No
Sub-Chapter I applies only to made up articles, of any textile fabric.

Goods with description implying "Dress materials/ready made garments fabrics/textile items with
imprints of excerpts or verses of the Holy Quran" are Restricted, and are subject to Policy
condition that Exports shall be permitted against a Restrcited Export Authorisation.

Sub-Chapter I does not cover : (a) goods of Chapters 56 to 62 ; or (b) worn clothing or other
worn articles of heading 6309

Heading 6309 applies only to the following goods : (a) articles of textile materials : (i) clothing
and clothing accessories, and parts thereof ; (ii) blankets and travelling rugs; (iii) bed linen, table
linen, toilet linen and kitchen linen ; (iv) furnishing articles, other than carpets of headings 5701 to

and tapestries of heading 5805. (b) footwear and headgear of any material other than
asbestos. In order to be classified in this heading, the articles mentioned above must comply with
both of the following requirements : (i) they must show signs of appreciable wear, and (ii) they
must be presented in bulk or in bales, sacks or similar packings.

Goods with description implying "Dress materials/ready made garments fabrics/textile items with

condition that Exports shall be permitted against a Restrcited Export Authorisation.

Heading 6309 applies only to the following goods : (a) articles of textile materials : (i) clothing
and clothing accessories, and parts thereof ; (ii) blankets and travelling rugs; (iii) bed linen, table
linen, toilet linen and kitchen linen ; (iv) furnishing articles, other than carpets of headings 5701 to

and tapestries of heading 5805. (b) footwear and headgear of any material other than
